video.title: The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Heroes
video.synopsis: The Avengers -- Thor, Ant-Man, Hulk, Iron Man and other heroes -- are ready to save the day from villains such as Loki, HYDRA and the Red Skull.

episodes.synopsis: When the villainous organization known as HYDRA attacks the United Nations, the fate of the world's leaders is in the hands of Iron Man!
episodes.title: Iron Man Is Born!

episodes.synopsis: The villainous Wrecking Crew is tearing through New York City, and the only thing that's standing in their way is the Mighty Thor!
episodes.title: Thor The Mighty

episodes.synopsis: When Bruce Banner heads to Vegas to track down an escapee from a Super-Villain prison, he's forced to transform into the Incredible Hulk.
episodes.title: Hulk Versus the World

episodes.synopsis: Captain America and Bucky join forces with Jack Fury and his Howling Commandos for a final confrontation with the Red Skull and his HYDRA forces!
episodes.title: Meet Captain America

episodes.synopsis: Catch three astonishing tales featuring Ant-Man and Wasp!
episodes.title: The Man in the Ant Hill

episodes.synopsis: On a day like no other, the Super Villain Prisons open wide, simultaneously releasing every single villain in a breakout the world has never seen.
episodes.title: Breakout: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Super Villain breakout has begun, and it's everything our heroes can do to stay alive!
episodes.title: Breakout: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers have assembled, but calling themselves a team is different than being one -- especially when you've got the Hulk as a member.
episodes.title: Some Assembly Required

episodes.synopsis: On the hunt for the Hulk, the Avengers stumble across another hero, long thought to be lost ... Captain America!
episodes.title: Living Legend

episodes.synopsis: Tony Stark's business decision leads rival Simon Williams to go to extreme measures for revenge: He seeks help from the Grim Reaper and AIM.
episodes.title: Everything Is Wonderful

episodes.synopsis: The Prince of Wakanda has been stalking the Avengers for weeks, and now the Black Panther strikes!
episodes.title: Panther's Quest

episodes.synopsis: A dome of gamma energy envelops the Cube, turning everyone inside of it into a gamma monster.
episodes.title: Gamma World: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Leader's master plan has been unleashed, and half of North America has been turned into Gamma Monsters, including the Avengers!
episodes.title: Gamma World: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Zemo! Enchantress! Executioner! Abomination! Wonder Man! Crimson Dynamo! Together, they are unstoppable.
episodes.title: Masters of Evil

episodes.synopsis: A Kree Sentry has arrived, heralding Earth's entry into an interstellar war between two alien empires.
Hawkeye's still out to take down the Black Widow, and he's going to shake down every HYDRA agent on the planet to do it.
episodes.title: Widow's Sting

episodes.synopsis: Kang the Conqueror has arrived in the 21st century with two goals: destroy Captain America and take over the world.
episodes.title: The Man Who Stole Tomorrow

episodes.synopsis: Kang's invasion of Earth begins in earnest! A fleet of ships from the future unleashes war on the planet, and the Avengers are helpless to stop it.
episodes.title: Come the Conqueror

episodes.synopsis: Kang the Conqueror's takeover of Earth is well underway, and the Avengers launch a last-ditch offensive to stop the time traveler's plans.
episodes.title: The Kang Dynasty

episodes.synopsis: On the hottest day of the year, an ancient artifact is found and a cold wind blows.
episodes.title: The Casket of Ancient Winters

episodes.synopsis: HYDRA and AIM are waging war against one another in the streets of New York, and only one person knows why -- the Black Widow.
episodes.title: Hail, Hydra!

episodes.synopsis: Ant-Man has had enough of the violence. He wants to find a better way to bring peace and order to the world.
episodes.title: Ultron-5

episodes.synopsis: As the devastated team struggles with a loss, they don't realize that Ultron has transcended his body and infiltrated the world's computer systems.
episodes.title: The Ultron Imperative

episodes.synopsis: The end begins! As Thor and Iron Man work to find a way for Thor to return to Asgard, the Enchantress makes her move.
episodes.title: This Hostage Earth

episodes.synopsis: Lost and separated, the Avengers struggle to survive in the nine realms of Asgard.
episodes.title: The Fall of Asgard

episodes.synopsis: Eight realms have fallen, and only Midgard remains. The Avengers are nothing against his power. Loki has won. Every moment has led to this.
episodes.title: A Day Unlike Any Other

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers and the Fantastic Four are attacked by Doctor Doom's forces, who have come to capture Wasp and the Invisible Woman.
episodes.title: The Private War of Doctor Doom

episodes.synopsis: Caught without his armor, Tony Stark must face A.I.M.'s latest creation: Technovore, a power-hungry monster!
episodes.title: Alone Against A.I.M

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers hunt down the Masters of Evil, only to discover that someone else is trying to take them down first: the Enchantress!
episodes.title: Acts of Vengeance

episodes.synopsis: An envoy from a race of alien warriors comes to Earth to determine if humanity is fit to join its ever-expanding empire ... or be crushed in its path.
episodes.title: Welcome to the Kree Empire

episodes.synopsis: When Hank Pym realizes his Ant-Man suit was hijacked and used in a bank robbery, he takes it upon himself to find the thief.
episodes.title: To Steal an Ant-Man

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers attempt to protect mysterious Michael Korvac from strange aliens, but they soon realize that he is not the one who needs protection.
episodes.title: Michael Korvac

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers are torn apart when Nick Fury returns and reveals that the shape-shifting alien Skrulls have begun infiltrating the Earth!
episodes.title: Who Do You Trust?

episodes.synopsis: While searching for the fire demon Surtur, Thor is attacked by a powerful creature known as Beta Ray Bill. As the two battle, the unthinkable happens.
episodes.title: The Ballad of Beta Ray Bill

episodes.synopsis: When S.H.I.E.L.D. comes under attack by the Hulk, the Avengers rush to the scene. But when they arrive, the rampaging Hulk they find is red!
episodes.title: Nightmare in Red

episodes.synopsis: After being held prisoner for months by the Skrulls, Captain America is ready to break out. But if he is to succeed, he must team up with his enemies.
episodes.title: Prisoner of War

episodes.synopsis: The shape-shifting aliens known as the Skrulls begin their invasion of Earth, starting with Wakanda ... and only Ms. Marvel is there to stop it.
episodes.title: Infiltration

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers reunite to face the full might of the Skrulls as the alien invasion hits Earth!
episodes.title: Secret Invasion

episodes.synopsis: The whole city has turned against Captain America in the aftermath of the Skrull invasion.
episodes.title: Along Came a Spider

episodes.synopsis: Now that the threat of alien invasion is over, Captain America does his best to restore hope to the world by rallying what's left of the Avengers.
episodes.title: Behold: The Vision!

episodes.synopsis: Loki remains a prisoner and smolders with hatred for the Avengers and his half-brother, Thor -- until the Enchantress offers him a chance at revenge.
episodes.title: Powerless

episodes.synopsis: Whirlwind's off to prison again. Captain America, Wasp and Ms. Marvel escort him to a cell in 42, Hank Pym's micro-prison in the Negative Zone.
episodes.title: Assault on 42

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers are attacked by robotic versions of themselves as part of Ultron's plan to replace humanity.
episodes.title: Ultron Unlimited

episodes.synopsis: Wasp and Iron Man try to persuade Hank Pym to rejoin the Avengers.
episodes.title: Yellowjacket

episodes.synopsis: The Vision awakens after a month of repairs, only to find that Iron Man and the Avengers have taken over the Earth!
episodes.title: Emperor Stark

episodes.synopsis: Mysterious fumes in the Avengers' mansion suddenly cause everyone to fall ill ... including the civilians outside!
episodes.title: Code Red

episodes.synopsis: No one knows who the Winter Soldier is or his origins. But one thing is certain: He's the Red Skull's top recruit, which makes him a dangerous foe.
episodes.title: Winter Soldier

episodes.synopsis: Now that the Skrull threat is over and his innocence has been cleared, Bruce isn't just mad -- he's raging.
episodes.title: The Deadliest Man Alive

episodes.synopsis: When Kang the Conqueror traps the Avengers and begins to bring his armies to the 21st century, Iron Man forges a new team.
episodes.title: New Avengers

episodes.synopsis: The Kree have arrived to create a wormhole linking our solar system and theirs, which wouldn't be bad if they weren't tearing the sun in the process.
episodes.title: Operation Galactic Storm

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers' space adventure concludes in a crash landing on the alien Kree homeworld, Hala.
episodes.title: Live Kree or Die

episodes.synopsis: The Avengers have fought time-traveling conquerors and shape-shifting aliens, but all that pales in comparison to the insatiable Galactus.
episodes.title: Avengers Assemble!
